ygData.subject: Battle At The Cave
ygData.msgSnippet: ... DrillBit ran up to where Kitkat was. He  aimed his gattaling gun, at random Maxis, and opened fire, through the small opening, at the door.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit ran up to where Kitkat was. He  aimed his gattaling gun, at
random Maxis, and opened fire, through the small opening, at the door.
